Common questions

Everything you need to know about our service

How does grocery delivery work?

Simply browse stores, add items to your cart, choose a delivery time, and checkout. A personal shopper will pick and deliver your order.

How much does delivery cost?

Delivery fees start at $3.99 for same-day orders over $35. Fees vary based on order size and delivery time.

What if something is out of stock?

Your shopper will contact you to suggest replacements or refund the item if you prefer.

Can I schedule delivery for later?

Yes! You can schedule delivery for as fast as 1 hour or up to a week in advance.

Is there a membership fee?

No membership required! However, we offer a premium membership with unlimited free delivery and exclusive perks.
